pageProduct.name: Palmers Olive Butter Lotion 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Olive Oil Formula Body Lotion is loaded with vitamins and minerals that act as antioxidants. Olive Oil is well known for being a skin protectant and moisturiser. This creamy lotion penetrates skin immediately, leaving it feeling soothed and softened.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

The lipid profile for Olive Oil is nearly identical to skin's lipid profile, making it very easily absorbed, with no irritation. Paraben and Phthalate Free.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glyceryl Stearate, Petrolatum, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopheryl, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Rahnella/Soy Protein Ferment, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Dimethicone, PEG-8 Stearate, Hydroxyethyl-cellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Stearalkonium Chloride, Cellulose, Sodium Acetate, Polysorbate-20, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), Stearyl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, Citral, Limonene, Linalool.

Directions

Apply daily, as often as you like, all over body.
